item.title: Cohere’s smallest, fastest R-series model excels at RAG, reasoning in 23 languages
item.description: Cohere's Command R7B uses RAG, features a context length of 128K, supports 23 languages and outperforms Gemma, Llama and Ministral.

item.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Projects, letting you organize files, chats in groups
item.description: Projects in ChatGPT allows users to create folders and add conversations and documents, bringing these capabilities together in one place.

item.title: Shutterstock pioneers ‘research license’ model with Lightricks, lowering barriers to AI training data
item.description: Shutterstock launches innovative "research license" model with Lightricks, making ethical AI training data more accessible for startups while ensuring...

item.title: Pika 2.0 launches in wake of Sora, integrating your own characters, objects, scenes in new AI videos
item.description: Advanced image recognition tech ensures these components are seamlessly integrated into AI generated videos, giving creators more control.

item.title: NotebookLM updates Business to Plus with more audio, lets all users interact with AI hosts
item.description: Google releases a new paid version of NotebookLM to enterprises, teams and power users, and offers new interactions with its audio feature.
